request.description: Get a random mocked Sample (Network + Collector + Sensor)
Get a new random SensorNet Network (Mock)
Get a new random mocked Collector
Get a new random mocked Sensor from SensorNet
Create a new Sample (Sample is an Object that encapsulates Network + Collector + Sensor) on SensorNet
Get a specific Network from SensorNet
Get all Sensors from a specific Network
Get all Collectors from a specific Network
Get a specific collector from a specific Network
Get all Sensors from a specific collector from a specific Network
Get a specific sensor from a specific collector from a specific Network
Generic Endpoint to test GET method from OMCP protocol directly.
